summary: The Kardashian-Jenner family is famous for their reality TV shows, especially "Keeping Up with the Kardashians" which aired from 2007 to 2021. The family, which includes Kim, Kourtney, Khlo√©, Rob, Kendall, and Kylie, became famous after Kim's private video was leaked in 2007. They are of Armenian-American descent and have successful businesses in fashion, beauty, and entertainment. The family has been called "America's most famous family" and has many spin-off shows and a new series called "The Kardashians" in 2022.
title: Kardashian family
